comment: An indexed union of a disjoint collection of disjoint collections is disjoint if each component is disjoint, and the disjoint unions in the collection are also disjoint. Note that ` B ( y ) ` and ` C ( x ) ` may have the displayed free variables. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Nov-2016.) (Proof shortened by JJ, 27-May-2021.)
